import React from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ContactService } from "../../services/ContactService"; import Spinner from "../../Spinner/Spinner"; let ContactList = () => { let [state, setState] = useState({ loading: false, contacts: [], errorMessage: '' }); useEffect(async() => { try { setState({...state, loading: true}); let response = await ContactService.getAllContacts(); setState({ ...state, loading: false, contacts: response.data }); } catch (error) { setState({ ...state, loading: false, errorMessage: error.message }); } }, []); let {loading, contacts, errorMessage} = state; return (
